I knew in advance we would be watching the show, so I brought furry animal ears for us to wear. Delaney and Evan loved them. Right-wing extremists were the targets of violence in fifteen percent of the cases. Acts of violence committed by left-wingers are on the rise in Germany. Between 2009 and 2013, left-wing political activists committed a total of 1,523 violent crimes, more than double the amount record from 2003 to 2008. Frank Henkel, a CDU politician and Interior Senator, contends that most violent crimes that are politically motivated come from the left-wing scene. "We have a temporary operations stop with the option to reopen if necessary. Whether that will happen, I can't say," Berlin government spokeswoman Eva Henkel told AFP. Officials had previously expressed doubts whether any flights will take off after mid-June from the beloved facility, with its iconic hexagon shape and highly unusual proximity to the city centre.
